manual.heading: PowerPlate Components
steps: Getting to know the main components of your MOVE PowerPlate device
The Move inner parts are quality designed to provide the highest performance with smooth experience
The device stays grounded and stable due to the 7 rubber feet on the bottom of the device
The metal base is used to house al the inner components of the MOVE and surrounded with a base guard
Next there is the Move Frequency inverter that calculated and determents the optimal frequency for your device
The motor set and the vibration rubber assembly is used to produce the vibration for you Move Panel
The platform assembly houses all the components for the Move Device
The Anti-slip sticker is mounted to the top of the device providing a good grip for your hands and feet
The control panel assembly houses all the parts the user gets to interact with to setup the workout session
The power cord gets attached to the control panel assembly providing your device with the power needed to run

manual.heading: PowerPlate Interface
steps: Getting to know the interface of your MOVE Powerplate device
The MOVE PowerPlate Power connection is controlled by the On/Off switch located on the back of the device
On the front of the device you can find the timer which indicates the length of your training session or how long will the device run
The start button turns on the device and starts the vibration
The pause button is used to stop the vibration and pause or reset the timer
Pressing the pause button once will pause the timer while pressing it twice will reset the timer
The Light Indicator panel Indicates the selected Frequency/Amplitude intensity
The intensity can be increased or decreased by using the + and - buttons next to the light Light Indicator panel
The MOVE PowerPanel addition attachments can be mounted to the mounting openings on the machine

manual.heading: How to use
steps: Start your training routine by plugging in Move PowerPanel into electricity
Turn on the power switch
Press the start button and setup the frequency using the + and - buttons
The Move PowerPanel can be used for the following sample exercises to prepare faster, perform better and recover quicker.
Hip Flexor Stretch
Single-Leg Hamstring Stretch
Inner Thigh Stretch
Squat
Bicep Curl
Push Ups
Quad Massage
Hamstring Massage
IT Band Massage
